trans-unit.source: Represents a single-row update operation expressed as a command tree.
trans-unit.target: 명령 트리로 표현된 단일 행 업데이트 작업을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbUpdateCommandTree.Returning%2A> property is set, the command returns a reader; otherwise, it returns a scalar value indicating the number of rows affected.
trans-unit.target: 이 명령은 <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbUpdateCommandTree.Returning%2A> 속성이 설정되어 있으면 판독기를 반환하고, 그렇지 않으면 영향을 받은 행 수를 나타내는 스칼라 값을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" /> that specifies the predicate used to determine which members of the target collection should be updated.
trans-unit.target: 대상 컬렉션에서 업데이트할 멤버를 결정하는 데 사용되는 조건자를 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" />을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" /> that specifies the predicate used to determine which members of the target collection should be updated.
trans-unit.target: 대상 컬렉션에서 업데이트할 멤버를 결정하는 데 사용되는 조건자를 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The predicate can include only the following elements: a <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbComparisonExpression> representing equality; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbConstantExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbIsNullExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression>; a <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbVariableReferenceExpression> that references the target; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAndExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbOrExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNotExpression>.
trans-unit.target: 조건자는 다음 요소만 포함 될 수 있습니다:는 <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbComparisonExpression> 같음; 나타내는 <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbConstantExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbIsNullExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbVariableReferenceExpression> target;를 참조 하는 <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAndExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbOrExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNotExpression>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" /> that specifies a projection of results to be returned, based on the modified rows.
trans-unit.target: 수정된 행에 기반하여 반환될 결과의 프로젝션을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" />을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" /> that specifies a projection of results to be returned based, on the modified rows.
trans-unit.target: 수정된 행을 기반으로 반환될 결과의 프로젝션을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> indicates that no results should be returned from this command.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" />은 이 명령에서 결과가 반환되지 않음을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The returning projection includes only the following elements: <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNewInstanceExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression>.
Gets the list of update set clauses that define the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 업데이트 작업을 정의하는 update set 절의 목록을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The list of update set clauses that define the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 업데이트 작업을 정의하는 update set 절의 목록입니다.
